app.title: TTR Calculator
explanation.text: The Table Tennis Rating (TTR) is a measure to determine a player's strength. This app provides a simple way to calculate changes of the TTR resulting from playing matches. Simply fill out all the fields and hit Submit.
calculator-form.player.title: Player
calculator-form.player.text: Please enter the current TTR value and select the appropriate checkboxes.
calculator-form.player.year-break-less-1: Paused for at least one year and less than 15 single games since then
calculator-form.opponents.title: Opponents
calculator-form.opponents.text: Please enter die opponent's TTR values here and select the checkboxes in case of won games. You can use the symbols for plus and minus to the change the number of opponents.
calculator-form.invalid.player-ttr: Please provide a valid TT rating.
calculator-form.invalid.opponent-ttr: Please provide a valid TT rating for opponent {{number}}.
result.title: Result
result.initially-no-result: To get a result, fill out the form above and click the Submit button.
